intros st h out st' m H.
intro Hcontra.
destruct Hcontra as [o Hin].
apply key_in_output_list_split in Hin.
destruct Hin as [Hin | Hin].
+ apply doLeader_same_log in H.
  apply log_matching_interface in H.
  contradiction.
+ apply doLeader_appliedEntries in H.
  apply applied_entries_monotonic_interface in H.
  contradiction.
Qed.
